name: The Biggest Boss
description:
My entry for WGJ 102.

I didn't want to go with the most obvious interpretation of the theme (fighing a boss), so I decided to make a Mount Your Friends/QWOP style game where you play as a manager in a corporation named Phil who goes on a metaphorical mountain climb to discover himself (his personal boss fight?)

A bit of a stretch, but it is what it is.

Controls:

- Move Phil's limbs around by left-clicking and dragging with the mouse
- While dragging a limb you can right-click to lock its rotation

- When a limb is close to a surface, press its corresponding key to grab onto that surface
- While a limb is grabbing a surface, clicking and dragging will pivot it (and the rest of Phil) around the grab position

Help Phil get to the top of the mountain and grab his dream.

Assets downloaded from the Asset Store, opengameart.org and freepik.com, except for Phil, who was drawn by my girlfriend.

Music: If I Had a Chicken by Kevin MacLeod
